reviewText: How would you react to losing everything you did yesterday ... day after day.  And there is nothing you can do about it.  But you have to live.  To make matters worse, you are a brilliant scientist that has made enormous difference to our understanding of the Universe.  How would you react to being the family of this person?  How would you love this person, no matter what?  Again, this is a story with a lot of Heart.  Worth adding to your collection.  When you think your life is tough, watch this movie!
Three GREAT movies for just a little more than the cost of one of the three movies!!! Such a GREAT deal!
